messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: I’ll always stand by our community. I will continue to oppose Brexit under any circumstances. I’ll keep fighting for genuinely affordable homes. Housing is my number one priority and always will be. I’ll stand up for health and care services, I will continue to champion free health and care services for all. I’ll keep opposing Tory cuts to education. I’ll stay focused on giving Southwark kids the best education and opportunities. I’ll continue to stay strong on policing and defence. Your family’s safety is important to me. I will always put you and your family first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will continue to oppose Brexit under any circumstances.
I’ll keep fighting for genuinely affordable homes. Housing is my number one priority and always will be.
I’ll stand up for health and care services, I will continue to champion free health and care services for all.
I’ll keep opposing Tory cuts to education. I’ll stay focused on giving Southwark kids the best education and opportunities.
I’ll continue to stay strong on policing and defence. Your family’s safety is important to me. I will always put you and your family first.
